name: Womens Sweatshirts (Pullover)
description:
Well, We are Based out of Boise, Idaho.... and its cold here, haha. So we busted out these simple but super comfy surfer sweatshirts. Perfect for those multi season shredders that are swapping from surf to snow, and for the lake dwellers that don't want to admit its winter season yet. 
Surf This!!

name: Brigade Surf Traction (KickPad)
description:
ntroducing a new player into the surf traction world...BRIGADE SURF TRACTION.  EVA foam available in multiple colors, full sets, tail kick pad, or center bars only.

We are all about style so feel free to attach a message to us with your order if you want to mix up your traction colors.  Our traction was designed just for this purpose!

Don't see what you are looking for e-mail us a info@brigadewakesurfing.com and we will see if we can get the color and cut you want.

Full traction sets come in 8 sections - Your choice of arch bar or flat center sections. ($70.00)

Tail kick pad comes in 2 sections - Your choice of arch bar or flat center section. ($35.00)

Flat Center Bars (3 to a set) - Black Diamond Cut ($30.00)

Arch Center Bars (3 to a set) - Black Diamond Cut ($30.00)

Brigade Surf Traction - Designed by Riders. Built for Riders.

name: 2014 A-Ron pro series - Aces Line: Brigade House
description:
Available for Order August 1st

The A-Ron pro series is Aaron "A-RON" Witherell's Pro Series Surf Style wakesurfer for the 2014 season.  This model is apart of the Aces Line: Brigade House.  USA made in the Brigade House in Boise, Idaho

This board is described in two words..."YEAH MANG!!!"

Specs.

4'6" x 20" X 1 7/8"
EPS EPOXY
Performance Laming Process
Appel Core Stringer
Futures Boxes and Fins
Fin Lay Outs - (5-fin)
Tail - A-bomb Squash Tail
Choice of Brigade Surf Traction with multiple Color Options
Rasta Painted rails with A-ron's own Northwest tribute design Graphic Inlay

All Aces Line: Brigade House boards are designed and made in-house by Sixx and W-Step, CNC Cut blanks, Hand Shaped for final tweaks to rails and concaves, Install of Paint/Graphic Inlays, and then Lamed and Hot coated in the Brigade House Factory!  Made in Idaho, USA.

Price - $849.99

Every A-ron pro series Aces Line: Brigade House board is made to order.

For questions e-mail info@brigadewakesurfing.com

categories.name: Wakesurf Boards: Aces Line Brigade House

name: Tamarindo 54" and 58" - Nemesis Line: Off The Rack (Skim Style)
description:
The Tamarindo got its name from the very first ocean surf trip Brigade took down to Coasta Rica.  A trip that we will never forget with many first, tons of good memories, and fun times with a bunch of wakesurfing and ocean surfing pals.  In honor of that trip the Tamarindo 54" and 58" got its name.

The Tamarindo skim style wakesurfer is the very first production board from Brigade Wakesurfing and the first board from the Nemesis Line.  All our Nemesis Line boards are our production models designed for the beginner rider who is not yet ready to throw down for their own custom Brigade House board, but still want to be apart of the Brigade Wakesurfing Lifestyle the Nemesis Line is for these new comers to the sport of Wakesurfing!

Length / Width: 54" x 20 1/4"   or   58" x 20 3/4"
Nose Rocker: 2 1/4"
Tail Rocker: 1/2"
Fin Set-up: Single Futures 1/2" box with TMF-1 Knubster fin
Tail: Pin Tail
Concaves: Double bottom concave 
Deck: Bamboo 
Rails: White
Bottom: White
Traction: Brigade Surf Traction with multiple color options

*Available Upgrade Custom Paint Options* 

Basic (Bottom) - Up to 3 colors simple taping design or brush pattern - $75

* More colors and crazier design call or e-mail for pricing.
       
Shipping outside of the USA Call for Pricing.

We Recommend a Brigade Board Sock with every board purchase to protect your stick form the sun!!!

name: Aviator - Aces Line: Brigade House
description:
Aviator - Aces Line: Brigade House (USA made in Boise, ID)

This is the board for the young groms (kids) of the sport of wakesurfing!  Young kids are becoming more and more active in the sport of wakesurfing but there are not a lot of boards made for those light weight riders...so we decided that needed to change!  Introducing the AVIATOR for riders 0 - 100 lbs. 

Specs.

3' 9"x 19" X 1 1/4"
EPS EPOXY
Appel Core Stringer
Futures Boxes and Fins
Fin Lay Out -Thurster
Tail Options - Aviator Tail, Squash
Traction Color Options

*Optional Paint Colors or Graphic Inlay

All Aces Line Boards are designed and made in-house by Sixx and W-Step, CNC Cut blanks, Hand Shaped for final tweaks to rails and concaves, Install of Paint/Graphic Inlays, and then Lamed and Hot coated in the Brigade House Factory!  Made in the Northwest, USA.

Starting Price - $699.99 and up.

description:
Bomber 21" - Aces Line: Brigade House (USA made in Boise, ID)

The Bomber is the board for a all around boat board.  Yet it was designed for the WAKE MAKERS of the Sport of Wakesurfing!!!  The Bomber comes in 2 different widths a 21" wide for riders 190 lbs. - 250 lbs. and 22" wide for riders over 250 lbs.  This is a all around fun board to Shred Your Stick Off in the Sweet Spot with!

Specs.

4'11" x 21" or 22" X 2"
EPS EPOXY
Appel Core Stringer
Futures Boxes and Fins
Fin Lay Outs (Thurster, Twin, Twinzer, Quad, 5-Fin , and 6-Fin)

name: Rogue 51" 54" 58" - Aces Line: Off The Rack (Skim Style)
description:
Rogue - Aces Line: Off The Rack (SKIM STYLE)

The Rogue skim style wakesurfer is the best skim board out in the market today and is USA made.  Inspired from kite boarders the Rogue has a our own Grasmick foam core material.  Why is Grasmick so unique?  If the board ever dings into the foam it wont absorb water!  So you can ride all day or all season before you have to fix it!!! Team Pro Rider Aaron Witherell and Grant Witherell put these boards to the test and they both gave them a BIG YEAH MANG!!!!

Rogue comes stock in flat grey in a 51" , 54" , and 58" long board.  The fin set-up is a single Futures 1/2" box with the new TMF-1 knubster fin. Topped off with your choice of Brigade Surf Traction color in Regular or W-step traction. 

Additional options for paint or wrap available on request.

E-mail sales@brigadewakesurfing.com for more information.

*Upgrade Paint Options*

Basic (per side) - Up to 3 colors simple taping or brush pattern. ($75)

Extreme - Call or E-mail for pricing.

categories.name: Wakesurf Boards: Aces Line OFF THE RACK

name: .352 special - Aces Line: Brigade House
description:
.352 special - Aces Line: Brigade House (USA made in Boise, ID) 

The first board model out of the Briagde Wakesurfing surf shack the .352 special designed with a motocross influence and a calibration of boards influences from 10 years of wakesurf riding experience from Nick "Sixx" Scott.  This board offers the best performance in all areas of your wake.  A perfect choice for all riding ranges! Light weight and ready for you to perform BIG AIRS and Spin Tricks!!!

Specs.

4'8" x 20" X 1 7/8"
EPS EPOXY
Appel Core Stringer
Futures Boxes and Fins
Fin Lay Outs (Thurster, Twin, Twinzer, Quad, 5-Fin , and 6-Fin)

categories.name: Wakesurf Boards: Aces Line Brigade House

name: Fish Tail LongBoards w/ Carver Trucks
description:
Brigade Wakesurfing finally found the perfect longboard for the Wakesurfer on the street. We know gas isn't cheep when wakesurfing every day so... our Research and Development team have ridden every longboard on the market to find a skateboard that feels and moves like a wakesurfer.... and we found the perfect match with Samuri Decks and Carver Trucks to create that surfer feel when cruising the streets of Downtown.
No longer will you kick your way down the street on a board. With the state of the art trucks from Carver you can now pump your skateboard just like a surfboard and keep your feet on the board. 

Available with Carver Trucks or Gullwing Trucks 
       Carver Trucks -SURFER FEEL
       Gullwing Trucks -CLASSIC LONGBOARD FEEL

options.name: Fish Tail LongBoard with Carver Trucks

name: Brigade Surf Wax
description: Adding to the Brigade Surf Traction line comes Brigade Surf WAX!!!! When foam traction is just not your thing now you can rub your stick with Cold, Warm, or Tropical Brigade Surf Wax! Keeps your feet stuck to your board.

options.name: Cold Water (64 - Below) - Brigade Surf Wax

name: Boarders Mag - Surf Within
description:
Brigade House is proud to announce that we will be carrying Boarders Mag and help support this great group of individuals who work to make this magazine come to life!  They are a small company like ourselves who are all about board sports.  They are just like us, we are all about riding and having fun with our surf buddies 24/7.  So spread the word about Boarders Mag and lets help support a great company that is here to push the sport of wakesurfing and all other board sports story by story and picture by picture!

Send or hashtag your pics and stories they want to promote every board sport and with your submissions they will show the world the lifestyle of the boarding world.

Follow them on Facebook and Instagram @boardersmag

First Issue - Free Digital @ www.boardersmag.com

1 year subscription - $32.95

2 year subscripton - $54.95

name: Nectar Shades
description:
Everybody has different stories on how 4/20 came about. Does it really matter? Live life and enjoy the day! These colors represent Jamaica. Rep it well. 

The length of the frame is exactly 5 1/2 inches. They are 1.875 in. tall and the arms are exactly 5 1/4 inches long 

Some special features of these shades: UV400 protection for your eyes...you're welcome, impact resistant lenses (but try not to step on them), made to be durable and lightweight to take a beating.

name: Nectar Shades 1
description:
Nectar is a lifestyle company, celebrating those who live in the moment.  Nectar offers customizable sunnies at a price that won't hurt your bank account.  Mix and match, rep your school, rock 'em at night, wear them on the slopes, at a concert or while surfing.  Whatever your heart desires! 

The length of the frame is exactly 5 1/2 inches.  They are 1.875 in. tall and the arms are exactly 5 1/4 inches long

Some special features of these shades:   UV400 protection for your eyes...you're welcome, impact resistant lenses (but try not to step on them), made to be durable and lightweight to take a beating.

Who Doesn't love a good Lanyard for your keys, well Brigade Wakesurfing just released our new SURF THIS lanyards.

name: Tiki Toss Backyard Game
description:
Bring this classic Island hook-and-ring game home and enjoy endless fun while testing your skills. Great fun for all ages. Crafted from 100% Bamboo, Perfect for indoors or out. Get hooked up in a few minutes.
All hardware and easy setup instructions included.

name: Lifeform LED Boat Lights
description:
Brigade Wakesurfing has teamed up with another Idaho local company Life Form LED Lights to help shine some light on your NIGHT WAKESURFING WAVE you definitely need these INSANE lights on your Surf Boat.

Lifeform 9 - $359.00

name: Brigade Board Socks
description:
Get yourself a Surf Board snuggie to keep your board safe while you are transporting it to and from the lake. 

Fits boards sizes from 3'9" to 5' 0" Tall  and  24" Wide

Available Colors:
     Army Gray

name: Hand Made Board Socks
description:
Custom and hand made by Grandma Wright. Her own sweat, blood, and tears were put into the making of these socks to keep your board safe from scratches or dings. Contact us today to get your personalized sock ordered!!

Available designs:
Rainbow Zebra
Blue Marble
Green Marble
Poker Suits

Idaho Vandals

name: Custom "Granny" Hand Made Board Socks
description:
Custom and hand made by Grandma Wright. Her own sweat, blood, and tears were put into the making of these socks to keep your board safe from scratches or dings. Contact us today to get your personalized sock ordered!!

Available in many colors and designs

Email Info@brigadewakesurfing.com  or Pick out one of these stock color socks to ship out today

name: Back Pack Double Board Bag
description:
Bring your boards to and from the lake safely with Brigade Wakesurfing Back Pack Board Bags. Durable enough for travel and tons of room for two boards. 
With two 3 different size options you can get the perfect bag for your board.
Along with the convenient back pack straps and huge front pocket for fins and wax. This is the one and only bag you will ever need.

Available in black w/silver in Double Board bag
        60"
        66"

Available in Red, Blue, Grey in Single Board bag
        64"

name: V2 Rasta Quad - Futures Fins
description:
Performance Quad set from Futures.

Color: Black/Bamboo

Front Fins:

Height: 4.44	in,    	11.28	cm
Base:   4.31	in,    	10.95	cm
Area:  14.72	sq in,	94.97	sq cm

Rear Fins:

Height: 3.79	in,    	9.63	cm
Base:   3.78	in,    	9.60	cm
Area:  11.03	sq in,	71.16	sq cm

Co-designed with one of the world's best free surfers, this V2 quad set was created for high performance surfing. These fins are made with renewable bamboo, which provides a lively flex pattern, and are wrapped in symbolic art provided by Rasta. A medium sized template that performs in a variety of conditions. The Quad set up with a medium base and tip allow you to generate more drive and stay on rail.

A portion of the proceed from sales of the Rasta Quad will be donated to the Dave's non-profit organization, Surfers For Cetaceans.

name: V2 HS3 Hayden Shapes - Futures Fins
description:
Performance Thrusters - TechFlex - V2 Foil - HS3 Futures Fins

Color: Fluro Orange

HS3 - Hayden Shapes

Height:     4.29    in,        10.90    cm
Base:       4.18    in,        10.62    cm
Area:      13.04    sq in,    84.13    sq cm


    The HS3 is a grom/small rider fin designed by Hayden Cox, the creator of the FiberFlex technology. This fin uses our V2 foil that allows you to generate speed and improve bottom turns.

options.name: V2HS3- Futures Fins - Thusters - Fluro Orange

name: AM2 - 5-fin Thechflex set - Futures Fins
description:
Performance Fins from Futures.

AM2 5-Fin

Front Fins

Height:     4.73    in,        12.01    cm
Base:       4.64    in,        11.79    cm
Area:      15.98    sq in,    103.10    sq cm

Center Trailer

Height:     4.49    in,        11.40    cm
Base:       4.63    in,        11.79    cm
Area:      15.32    sq in,    98.84    sq cm

Quad Trailers

Height:     4.00    in,        10.16    cm
Base:       3.88    in,        9.86    cm
Area:      12.39    sq in,    79.94    sq cm

A popular template for the light footed large surfer. The large base with medium tip helps with powerful bottom turns and releasing the fins off the top. Try this laid back template in wrapping point breaks. Riding the quad rears instead of the center fin will add drive and hold.

description:
Performance fins from Futures.

V2 YU Quad

Front Fins:

    Our smallest quad fin. An upright template with a medium base and thin tip was designed for pivoty in the pocket surfing. This V2 quad was created to improve flow and generating speed.    
Color: Smoke

F4 Quad

    One of our most popular templates available as a quad setup. The F4 is a great for template medium sized riders looking for a fin that is a little looser or for smaller sized riders looking for a setup with a little more drive.

$42.00

name: TMF-1 Knubster Trailing Futures Fins
description:
Future Fin - TMF-1 "The Middle Finger"
H: 1.76" B:3.76" A:4.85"
Designed for use in 1/2" Future Boxes

This is the fin we use in all our skim boards!

name: FC5 Fins - Futures aka "Twinzers"
description:
FC5 fins from Futures come in a set of 2.

We call these Twinzers!!!!

name: Set Screws - Futures Fins
description: 10-24 thread set screw for Futures Boxes 7/16" in length

name: 1/2" Futures Box Filler
description:
1/2" Box Fillers for Futures Boxes.

Turn your Quad or Thruster into a Twin Fin by filling your Center and Rear Quad fins with a box filler to eliminate drag on your board.

name: 3/4" Futures Box Filer
description:
3/4" Box Filer for Futures Boxes.

If you want to make your Thruster and Single Fin ride then insert these plugs into your boxes to eliminate the drag a open box can make on your board.

name: Futures Fins Key
description: Key for use on Futures set screws and boxes.

name: Board Stix
description:
Tired of looking at the same design on the bottom of your board? Rid your world of boring boards and get yourself some BoardStix. Bring your inner 5 year old out and draw all over your surfer with these awesome paint pens and create a new board with an old board.

Available in every color you can dream up

name: Aces Line: Off The Rack (Surf Style boards)
description:
Coming August 1st

Aces Line: Off The Rack (Surf Style)  Aviator, Zulu, .352 special, Bomber 21" , Bomber 22"

The Aces Line: Off The Rack surf style series is our production line of our Original Brigade House boards.  All the Aces Line: Off The Rack boards are still Made in the USA just on a production scale.  This means the customization is LIMITED unlike a Aces Line: Brigade House board.  The "Off The Rack" line was designed by Brigade Wakesurfing for those riders who don't want to wait for a custom one of a kind Brigade House board.  Just like the name says "Off The Rack" they are ready to ship when your order is placed, unless you want a custom paint job or vinyl wrap on the finished board to still give your board that Brigade Wakesurfing STYLE we are know for!

Aces Line: Off The Rack (Surf Style) boards are available in the following models:
Aviator, Zulu, .352 special, Bomber 21", and Bomber 22" 

All of these come STOCK white, with Futures boxes, Futures Fins V2F4 fins in a Thruster Set-up.  Each board has its own signature tail (Aviator Tail, Swallow Tail, A-bomb Tail, Round Tail, and Squash Tail) All of these boards are US Blanks EPS foam cores with Appel Core Stringers, Epoxy glassed with 4 oz and 6 oz S-glass layers, and your choice of Brigade Surf Traction or Brigade "W-step" Surf Traction in the color patterns of your choice. All boards will come with standard Brigade Wakesurfing logos.

Prices: Aviator - $649.99 , ZULU, .352 , Bombers - $749.99

Aviator 3'9" for riders 0-100 lbs.
Zulu 4'6" for riders 120 lbs. - 170 lbs.
.352 special 4'8" for riders 170 lbs. - 190 lbs.
Bomber 21 4'11" for riders 190 lbs. - 230 lbs.
Bomber 22  4'11" for riders 230 lbs. - Plus

* Weight ranges depend on your boat wake size and power.  If you have a small/soft wave get a bigger board.

E-mail info@brigadewakesurfing.com for more information.

Brigade Wakesurfing - It's More Than Just Surfing...It's a LIFESTYLE!!!

categories.name: Wakesurf Boards: Aces Line OFF THE RACK
